title: EXCELLENT .. in every detail
text: Incredible, we have owned a home in Mesa for almost 10 years and had given up on PHX as a place to find fine food and wine .. then all of a sudden, thanks to Trip Advisor we find Cafe Monarch ,, INCREDIBLE food, wine, service, timing of plates .. the only comment is that after finally finding "pluma" in the USA, the chef overcooked it .. may be due to US health laws but in Spain it is ALWAYS served medium rare .. another plus for them was that they were able to serve me Foie Gras and Banyuls for dessert .. something I have never seen except in France .. ouh la la.. we'll be back!! Plate after plate ... superb!! the timing was perfect .. who wants to be rushed? We spent about 4+ hours dining. that's what I call a dinner ..

title: Always First Class
text: This was the first stay in a Penthouse..super views and spacious rooms. I love the kitchen. Love eggs my way in the AM. Late night popcorn..beds are super comfy. Laundry is nice to have in the room.. They even provided the soap.
place: Vdara Hotel & Spa at ARIA Las Vegas
